Deposit

To submit this application you must provide the credit card information requested below. By providing this information and submitting your application, you are authorizing us to charge your credit card for an $18.50 credit report fee which is CapCenter's out of pocket cost for ordering a credit report. If you close a loan with us, this fee is waived. However, if you are denied or if you choose to withdraw after we have ordered your credit report, then we will charge the $18.50 to you.

When you return your signed committment letter to us, we will require a Good Faith Deposit of $450. When you closer your loan with us, we will refund the entire deposit. If you do not close a loan with CapCenter, we will keep this deposit to offset any third party costs we have incurred, such as the appraisal. This deposit is not required to submit an application.

Common Application Questions

  • Why do I need to provide my SSN?

After you submit your application we will contact you to confirm the information and answer your questions. if you need assistance while competing the online application, please feel free to contact us. We are available Monday through Friday from 8:30 am to 5:00 pm EST.
